dcterms:description: REVERIE contains several human-annotated instructions for paths taken from the Matterport3D environment. The language used in the instructions uniquely captures various aspects of the environment. Each path is described as a discrete set of adjacent photorealistic panoramic images, containing around 8 adjacent pano images (or hops) on average, annotated with coarse-grained language guidance to reach target locations.
dcterms:title: REVERIE

dcterms:description: Matterport3D is a dataset that provides RGB-D data in indoor environments, which is used for various tasks including navigation and scene understanding.
dcterms:title: Matterport3D

dcterms:description: R2R is a dataset designed for Vision-and-Language Navigation, focusing on interpreting visually-grounded navigation instructions in real environments.
dcterms:title: R2R

dcterms:creator: Fengda Zhu

dcterms:description: SOON is a dataset focused on scenario-oriented object navigation with graph-based exploration, designed to facilitate research in navigation tasks.
dcterms:title: SOON
